Hello,
Thanks for visiting my profile page.

I have been developed many mobile apps for 6 years.
My main skills are iOS app/game development and Android app/game development. I already developed many mobile apps with social networks(such as Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn and so on), Restful JSON based Web Service, database management(such as sqlite), google-map, finess app, audio/video streaming services.

And I have considerable expertise in VOIP apps development. I have developed many VOIP apps so far. The Media5-fone VOIP SIP app is my example project that I developed from scratch.

Also I am very famiiliar with Mobile Games developement. I have integrated the games with chartboost, revmob, applovin, admob, iAd, twitter,facebook, linkedin, flurry, Pushwoosh,  tapjoy and so on.

I am usually working 12 hours per day. And I think the clients in any countries can communicate with me easily because I am online nearly all the day. 
I am using skype. So you can easily communicate with me.

description.title: Linux Server Configuration & Deployment
description: Just buy your first VPS? Want to host some web pages, or run your own MineCraft server? I can set up and configure your host for you.

abstrac: Need some help? Let me show you what's missing.
bio:
My skills cover a wide array of web related technologies, from Apache to Wordpress, CentOS to VPS. Understanding how your systems work together is important for  technological harmony!

Sometimes you just need something to work, and I understand that- No problem. Other times, you may be looking for someone to connect the dots for you, so you can fix it yourself next time! I'm more than happy to show you the WHY behind your issue, cutting through the "computer jargon alphabet soup" with real-life analogies my mother can understand.

Hours are flexible, let me know what you need. I accept any method of payment, including Bitcoin. I feel like I do my best communicating via text (live chat or email), but sometimes voice works better.

abstrac: What visitors perceive of a graceful website
bio: A website can either make or mar your online business. If you have a graceful and appealing website, the manner in which your website appeals will be different as compared to a website that is dull and without any information. I have been in this field for several years now. I make use of all the simple tools that are also used by other web designers but the manner in which I will grace your website will be unique. You are sure to love my work as my other clients have always. How do I do all this? No rocket science here! Making judicious use of Joomla, Magento, WordPress, WordPress themes and templates is what I do. I also use appropriate visual arts, typography, and images for the website that makes it look graceful. I have developed walls of Facebook, Twitter, and You Tube. And I have also created apps for Facebook. I am comfortable with Strict and Transitional DOCTYPES and all my pages are W3C Validated.

I normally follow the following protocol for Wordpress Development :

Step 1 : Create the Graphical Layout in Photoshop and send the Mock ( JPG ) for approval.

Step 2: Once the Mock is approved, The PSD to HTML Conversion is done and the URL of the HTML page is send for approval.

Step 3: Once the HTML is approved , HTML to Wordpress Theme conversion Takes place.

Step 4: The Theme will be installed on our development server and URL of the wordpress site is send for the approval of the theme.

Step 5 : Once the theme is approved , Internal pages are created and other functionalities are implemented.
